title: KATARINA BUFFS?!?! @Meddler
body: Thank you. (She has felt weaker after the TP nerfs) These aren't too game breaking for her and her kit, and they at least boost some of her last hitting capabilities. Any reason why you are giving her these buffs? She is pretty binary so it is a shock that she isn't waiting for a rework/kit update.

replies.body: We think there might be some room for small changes to her so we're trying out some light stuff. She does still have some issues with excessively binary, hard to respond to performance though as you say. I expect we'll want to make more significant changes someday (long term) as a result.
What would you guys think of letting her E get a range increase to targets marked with Bouncing Blades?

> [{quoted}](name=AvantelWings,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-02-09T22:25:27.141+0000)
>
> What would you guys think of letting her E get a range increase to targets marked with Bouncing Blades?

This would make her too strong.

I would say just revert the unnecessary nerf on Kata's E damage and she will almost decent.  Until anything she would need a kit rework for the increase E range to be viable she is just too binary atm :/

Hopefully you guys keep these light buffs considering they help her laning which desperately needed help! Hopefully later towards the end of the year during the assassin update you guys can brain storm so she isn't too kit related to Diana and Akali! But these are very nice beginning points to work with! 
Thank you for your response and insight :D
Eh, at least the power is in the only bit of her kit that takes any amount of skill.

I don't think Katarina has low skill, she actually has a decent learning curve when players have played her long enough. Considering we smash our keys so fast players have to adapt to which people to target in quick response times, I think she takes more skill then some people think.
She takes a lot more skill than people think because people don't appreciate anything other than aiming and resource management.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-09T22:14:43.212+0000)
>
> We think there might be some room for small changes to her so we're trying out some light stuff. She does still have some issues with excessively binary, hard to respond to performance though as you say. I expect we'll want to make more significant changes someday (long term) as a result.

You said down the line you guys will do an Assassin update. Is Zed the only healthy Assassin atm? So all other Assassins wil get kit changes?
Zed is NOT healthy. Are you blind? A "healthy assassin" that isn't even really **classified** as a assassin is Diana. Not Zed.
Riots opinion > yours. Zed is a healthy Assassin.
LOL no.
LOL yes.
Just no. He is not healthy. If you think that fine, but doesn't change the fact that he is overpowered.
Just yes. That is exactly what riot thinks and says, Zed is the most healthy Assassin in the game :)
I think you are delusional.

From a pure assassin perspective, yes, Zed is the healthiest. His burst is tied to his ult, which can be removed or negated by several items, as well as it being completely stopped because of how telegraphed it is

No. LOL. Just no. 

I'm not going to argue any further so don't bother trying too. I'm laughing right now at how you two both think he is the healthiest. He is far from it.
Can you explain how he isn't?
lol no because I'm tired of talking with Zed mains, and anything I say you will probably argue against, hence why I said I'm not arguing any further.

Maybe you've won with Kayle, but that's just because her ult is an extra counter to him. It's hard to kill him with her. I'm sure any smart Zed would not sit under her E enough to be kited.

He can burst plenty enough without his ult.

I've been laughing at these people by saying "lol no." Not using them as a counter argument. Learn to read.

And yes, he is overpowered.

What a rude assumption you got there lol I do have reasons. Just tired of having to repeat them.

I'm not salty, and haven't lost to a Zed in a long time. Stop being rude and making wrong assumptions.

Take it from a Kayle main who has extensively been against Zeds. And won every time.

The mains are right. His burst is tied to his ult. Without it, he can´t do much. Sure he can farm, but so can everyone else.

I can´t say he is a healthy assassin, or the healthiest amongst them, but he sure isn´t overpowered, as you say.

Also, 'LOL no' hardly counts as a viable argument/counter-argument.

I have never played Zed at all. Ever.

And since you refuse to offer a reason, all you look like is salty and just hates Zed, not bothering to think why you might be losing to him
Think what you want, I don't care about the opinions of low elo players.
Wow. How rude. "Low elo" players have valuable opinions. You need to respect them.
Nope, all opinions from people who are not diamond 3-2-1 or higher are meaningless and valueless to me.
If you think that, then you have an awful personality and way of thinking.
It should. You're an awful person.

Both of you guys are dumb "noob pwn3r" is only lev 15 so don't argue with him, and I don't think he should give any opinions about anything because because of his lev. (I do know both of you guys are arguing like children and none of you have said any real evidence/reason to your guys "argument")
Doesn't matter since your opinion of me doesn't matter to me.

I feel kata has a fairly healthy design as far as goals for an assassin. Like, she's rewarded for diving in and getting a kill. Then she gets a reset that lets her either go back in or escape out (ward hop).
She definitely is more healthy than Zed is, that's for sure.
Did you just call Zed a healthy assassin?
nowone ever remembers us :{{champion:83}} {{champion:3}}

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-09T22:14:43.212+0000)
>
> We think there might be some room for small changes to her so we're trying out some light stuff. She does still have some issues with excessively binary, hard to respond to performance though as you say. I expect we'll want to make more significant changes someday (long term) as a result.

I love the changes but hopefully this is it until the significant changes because the last thing we need is kata being meta again ;-;
I rather have Kat be meta again rather than what's going on now.

> [{quoted}](name=QTPie448,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=000000070000,timestamp=2016-02-10T14:42:27.142+0000)
>
> I rather have Kat be meta again rather than what's going on now.

She was meta and look where it got her
She got nerfed significantly than the ADC/AD assassin meta came. Plus with all the CC now a days she's pretty weak. I want the meta she was in before rather than this.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-09T22:14:43.212+0000)
>
> We think there might be some room for small changes to her so we're trying out some light stuff. She does still have some issues with excessively binary, **hard to respond to performance** though as you say. I expect we'll want to make more significant changes someday (long term) as a result.

I really think that Kat cooldowns should be reset to 1 second(except for shunpo) on kills and not 0 to fix the "hard to respond to performance".
I'm so excited. This is so big to us Kat players :D

> [{quoted}](name=Poptart Kat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-09T22:59:58.894+0000)
>
> I'm so excited. This is so big to us Kat players :D

Yessss!!!! I haven't been able to play her in so long because she's just so weak now x-x
:D soon I hope for a rework/kit change but until then I am presently in bliss
And all those who play ARAM cry.
:D Then you realize, Kat's pretty weak compared to the other options. D: then you pray you don't get one.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilRabbitt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fzQtQYvk,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-09T23:36:39.808+0000)
>
> :D Then you realize, Kat's pretty weak compared to the other options. D: then you pray you don't get one.

Not really. It depends who she is against. She is OP unless someone has a like short CD insta stun who actually knows how to save it for Kat. Even her daggers hurt with Ludens given everyone is bunched on ARAM, and the laning phase is irrelevant.
How can the balance team even think buffing this abomination...
